1370: Ghodscalc moved to Lievevrouwe kerch.B.3 after marriage.
Got married to Suaneka at age 30 in 1370.
Had a daughter with Suaneka, Volcwiif, at age 30.
1373: Had a son with Suaneka, Sifridus, at age 33.
1375: Had a son with Suaneka, Tielen, at age 35.
Lost daughter Volcwiif when Volcwiif was 6 years old.
1376: Had a son with Suaneka, Wellinus, at age 36.
1378: Had a daughter with Suaneka, Aghete, at age 38.
Became caretaker of Sifridus, Tielen, Wellinus, Aghete at age 39.
